metadata.title: Biblical Genealogy Through Jesus
metadata.description: A comprehensive genealogical dataset tracing lineage from Adam through Jesus Christ
metadata.license: Open for educational and research purposes

adamToNoah.name: Adam
adamToNoah.significance: First man created by God, father of humanity

adamToNoah.name: Cain
adamToNoah.significance: First murderer, killed his brother Abel

adamToNoah.name: Abel
adamToNoah.significance: First murder victim, killed by his brother Cain

adamToNoah.name: Seth
adamToNoah.significance: Third son of Adam and Eve, ancestor of Noah

adamToNoah.name: Enosh
adamToNoah.significance: Son of Seth, when men began to call on the name of the LORD

adamToNoah.name: Kenan
adamToNoah.significance: Son of Enosh, father of Mahalalel

adamToNoah.name: Mahalalel
adamToNoah.significance: Son of Kenan, father of Jared

adamToNoah.name: Jared
adamToNoah.significance: Son of Mahalalel, father of Enoch

adamToNoah.name: Enoch
adamToNoah.significance: Walked with God and was taken without death

adamToNoah.name: Methuselah
adamToNoah.meaning: Man of the dart/When he dies, judgment
adamToNoah.significance: Longest lived human recorded in the Bible

adamToNoah.name: Lamech
adamToNoah.significance: Father of Noah, prophesied comfort through his son

adamToNoah.name: Noah
adamToNoah.significance: Built ark, survived flood, received covenant

noahToAbraham.name: Shem
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Noah, ancestor of Semitic peoples including Hebrews

noahToAbraham.name: Arphaxad
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Shem, born two years after the flood

noahToAbraham.name: Shelah
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Arphaxad, father of Eber

noahToAbraham.name: Eber
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Shelah, possible namesake of Hebrew people

noahToAbraham.name: Peleg
noahToAbraham.significance: In his days the earth was divided, possibly referring to Babel

noahToAbraham.name: Reu
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Peleg, father of Serug

noahToAbraham.name: Serug
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Reu, father of Nahor

noahToAbraham.name: Nahor
noahToAbraham.significance: Son of Serug, grandfather of Abraham

noahToAbraham.name: Terah
noahToAbraham.significance: Father of Abraham, Nahor, and Haran; led family from Ur to Canaan

abrahamToJudah.name: Abraham
abrahamToJudah.significance: Patriarch, received covenant with God, father of Israelite nation

abrahamToJudah.name: Sarah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Wife of Abraham, mother of Isaac

abrahamToJudah.name: Hagar
abrahamToJudah.significance: Sarah's handmaid, mother of Ishmael

abrahamToJudah.name: Ishmael
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Abraham and Hagar, father of 12 princes

abrahamToJudah.name: Isaac
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of promise to Abraham and Sarah, father of Jacob and Esau

abrahamToJudah.name: Rebekah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Wife of Isaac, mother of Jacob and Esau

abrahamToJudah.name: Esau
abrahamToJudah.significance: Firstborn of Isaac and Rebekah, sold birthright, founded Edom

abrahamToJudah.name: Jacob
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Isaac, father of 12 tribes of Israel, renamed Israel

abrahamToJudah.name: Leah
abrahamToJudah.significance: First wife of Jacob, mother of six sons and Dinah

abrahamToJudah.name: Rachel
abrahamToJudah.significance: Second wife of Jacob, mother of Joseph and Benjamin

abrahamToJudah.name: Bilhah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Rachel's handmaid, mother of Dan and Naphtali

abrahamToJudah.name: Zilpah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Leah's handmaid, mother of Gad and Asher

abrahamToJudah.name: Reuben
abrahamToJudah.significance: Firstborn son of Jacob and Leah, lost birthright due to sin

abrahamToJudah.name: Simeon
abrahamToJudah.significance: Second son of Jacob and Leah, tribe later absorbed into Judah

abrahamToJudah.name: Levi
abrahamToJudah.significance: Third son of Jacob and Leah, ancestor of priestly tribe

abrahamToJudah.name: Judah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Fourth son of Jacob and Leah, received ruling scepter promise

abrahamToJudah.name: Dan
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Jacob and Bilhah, tribal territory in north Israel

abrahamToJudah.name: Naphtali
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Jacob and Bilhah, tribe settled in northern Galilee

abrahamToJudah.name: Gad
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Jacob and Zilpah, tribe settled east of Jordan

abrahamToJudah.name: Asher
abrahamToJudah.significance: Son of Jacob and Zilpah, tribe settled in western Galilee

abrahamToJudah.name: Issachar
abrahamToJudah.significance: Fifth son of Jacob and Leah, tribe known for wisdom

abrahamToJudah.name: Zebulun
abrahamToJudah.significance: Sixth son of Jacob and Leah, tribe settled in northern Canaan

abrahamToJudah.name: Joseph
abrahamToJudah.significance: Firstborn of Jacob and Rachel, sold by brothers, became ruler in Egypt

abrahamToJudah.name: Benjamin
abrahamToJudah.significance: Youngest son of Jacob and Rachel, tribe produced first king

abrahamToJudah.name: Dinah
abrahamToJudah.significance: Daughter of Jacob and Leah, violated at Shechem

judahToJesse.name: Er
judahToJesse.significance: Firstborn son of Judah, died for wickedness

judahToJesse.name: Onan
judahToJesse.significance: Second son of Judah, died for refusing duty to brother's widow

judahToJesse.name: Tamar
judahToJesse.significance: Widow of Er and Onan, mother of Perez and Zerah by Judah

judahToJesse.name: Perez
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Judah and Tamar, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Zerah
judahToJesse.significance: Twin son of Judah and Tamar

judahToJesse.name: Hezron
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Perez, grandson of Judah

judahToJesse.name: Ram
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Hezron, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Amminadab
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Ram, father-in-law of Aaron, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Nahshon
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Amminadab, leader of Judah during Exodus
judahToJesse.title: Prince of Judah

judahToJesse.name: Salmon
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Nahshon, husband of Rahab, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Rahab
judahToJesse.significance: Helped Israelite spies, married Salmon, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Boaz
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Salmon and Rahab, husband of Ruth, ancestor of David

judahToJesse.name: Ruth
judahToJesse.significance: Moabite widow who followed Naomi, married Boaz, ancestress of David

judahToJesse.name: Obed
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Boaz and Ruth, grandfather of David

judahToJesse.name: Jesse
judahToJesse.significance: Son of Obed, father of David, lived in Bethlehem

davidToExile.name: David
davidToExile.significance: Second king of Israel, established kingdom, received Messianic covenant
davidToExile.title: King of Israel

davidToExile.name: Bathsheba
davidToExile.significance: Wife of Uriah, then David, mother of Solomon
davidToExile.title: Queen Mother

davidToExile.name: Solomon
davidToExile.significance: Third king of Israel, known for wisdom and wealth, built temple
davidToExile.title: King of Israel

davidToExile.name: Rehoboam
davidToExile.significance: First king of Judah after kingdom divided
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Abijah
davidToExile.significance: Second king of Judah
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Asa
davidToExile.significance: Third king of Judah, instituted religious reforms
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Jehoshaphat
davidToExile.significance: Fourth king of Judah, instituted judicial reforms
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Jehoram
davidToExile.significance: Fifth king of Judah, married Athaliah daughter of Ahab
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Ahaziah
davidToExile.significance: Sixth king of Judah, killed by Jehu
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Joash
davidToExile.significance: Eighth king of Judah, hidden as infant from Athaliah
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Amaziah
davidToExile.significance: Ninth king of Judah
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Uzziah
davidToExile.significance: Tenth king of Judah, effective ruler but struck with leprosy
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Jotham
davidToExile.significance: Eleventh king of Judah
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Ahaz
davidToExile.significance: Twelfth king of Judah, introduced idolatry
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Hezekiah
davidToExile.significance: Thirteenth king of Judah, instituted religious reforms
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Manasseh
davidToExile.significance: Fourteenth king of Judah, longest reign, notorious for evil but repented
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Amon
davidToExile.significance: Fifteenth king of Judah, followed evil ways of Manasseh
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Josiah
davidToExile.significance: Sixteenth king of Judah, instituted major religious reforms
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Jehoiakim
davidToExile.significance: Eighteenth king of Judah, puppet of Egypt then Babylon
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

davidToExile.name: Jeconiah
davidToExile.significance: Nineteenth king of Judah, exiled to Babylon
davidToExile.title: King of Judah

postExile.name: Zerubbabel
postExile.significance: Led first group of exiles back to Jerusalem, rebuilt temple
postExile.title: Governor of Judah

postExile.name: Abiud
postExile.significance: Son of Zerubbabel in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Eliakim
postExile.significance: Son of Abiud in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Azor
postExile.significance: Son of Eliakim in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Zadok
postExile.significance: Son of Azor in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Achim
postExile.significance: Son of Zadok in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Eliud
postExile.significance: Son of Achim in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Eleazar
postExile.significance: Son of Eliud in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Matthan
postExile.significance: Son of Eleazar in Matthew's genealogy

postExile.name: Jacob
postExile.significance: Father of Joseph, legal father of Jesus

jesusLineage.name: Joseph
jesusLineage.significance: Legal father of Jesus, husband of Mary

jesusLineage.name: Mary
jesusLineage.significance: Mother of Jesus, virgin who conceived by the Holy Spirit

jesusLineage.name: Jesus
jesusLineage.significance: Son of God, Messiah, Savior of the world

abraham.name: Abraham
abraham.significance: Father of the faithful, received covenant from God

abraham.name: Sarah
abraham.significance: Wife of Abraham, mother of Isaac

abraham.name: Hagar
abraham.significance: Egyptian handmaid of Sarah, mother of Ishmael

abraham.name: Ishmael
abraham.significance: Firstborn son of Abraham through Hagar

abraham.name: Isaac
abraham.significance: Son of promise, born to Abraham and Sarah in old age

abraham.name: Rebekah
abraham.significance: Wife of Isaac, mother of Jacob and Esau

abraham.name: Esau
abraham.significance: Firstborn son of Isaac and Rebekah, sold birthright

abraham.name: Jacob
abraham.significance: Father of the 12 tribes of Israel

leah.name: Leah
leah.significance: First wife of Jacob, mother of six sons and Dinah

leah.name: Reuben
leah.significance: Firstborn son of Jacob and Leah, lost birthright

leah.name: Simeon
leah.significance: Second son of Jacob and Leah

leah.name: Levi
leah.significance: Third son of Jacob and Leah, progenitor of priestly tribe

leah.name: Judah
leah.significance: Fourth son of Jacob and Leah, received ruling scepter

leah.name: Issachar
leah.significance: Ninth son of Jacob, fifth by Leah

leah.name: Zebulun
leah.significance: Tenth son of Jacob, sixth by Leah

leah.name: Dinah
leah.significance: Only daughter of Jacob mentioned by name

bilhah.name: Bilhah
bilhah.significance: Rachel's handmaid, mother of Dan and Naphtali

bilhah.name: Dan
bilhah.significance: Fifth son of Jacob, first by Bilhah

bilhah.name: Naphtali
bilhah.significance: Sixth son of Jacob, second by Bilhah

zilpah.name: Zilpah
zilpah.significance: Leah's handmaid, mother of Gad and Asher

zilpah.name: Gad
zilpah.significance: Seventh son of Jacob, first by Zilpah

zilpah.name: Asher
zilpah.significance: Eighth son of Jacob, second by Zilpah

rachel.name: Rachel
rachel.significance: Beloved wife of Jacob, mother of Joseph and Benjamin

rachel.name: Joseph
rachel.significance: Eleventh son of Jacob, first by Rachel, ruler in Egypt

rachel.name: Benjamin
rachel.significance: Twelfth son of Jacob, second by Rachel

tribes.name: Ephraim
tribes.significance: Second son of Joseph, received firstborn blessing from Jacob

tribes.name: Manasseh
tribes.significance: Firstborn son of Joseph, received secondary blessing

newTestament.name: Annas
newTestament.title: Former High Priest
newTestament.significance: Father-in-law of Caiaphas, influential religious leader

newTestament.name: Caiaphas
newTestament.title: High Priest
newTestament.significance: High priest who presided over trial of Jesus

newTestament.name: Herod Archelaus
newTestament.title: Ethnarch of Judea, Samaria, Idumea
newTestament.significance: Ruler after Herod's death, reason for Holy Family settling in Galilee

newTestament.name: John the Baptist
newTestament.significance: Prophet who prepared the way for Jesus, baptized Jesus

newTestament.name: Elizabeth
newTestament.significance: Mother of John the Baptist, relative of Mary

newTestament.name: Zechariah
newTestament.significance: Father of John the Baptist, priest who received angelic vision
